subtitleNullable: Perform Text Classification in Odia using this Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This data set contains ~19000 news article headlines which I had collected from Odia news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Odia

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-odia/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
title: Odia News Dataset
subtitle: Perform Text Classification in Odia using this Dataset
description:
This data set contains ~19000 news article headlines which I had collected from Odia news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Odia

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-odia/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
